description: Installation of replacement roof and associated works (Overlaying existing asphalt roof with an increased level of insulation, and a built-up bituminous felt waterproofing system.) Removal of an existing lantern light which has fallen into disrepair and like-for-like replacement using traditional materials - steel frame with lead capping and double glazed panels. Removal and replacement of existing skylights and like-for-like replacement using traditional materials - steel frame with lead capping and double glazed panels. Timber repair/replacement of existing dormer windows and replacement of lead cladding.  (Listed Building Consent Ref: P2017/2959 also submitted).
decision_conditions:
3 YEAR CONSENT PERIOD:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
